context: Dell Technologies Inc. is a technology infrastructure company focused on PCs, servers, storage, and IT infrastructure solutions. AI server demand surge with Nvidia. Storage and infrastructure growth.

competitors.name: Hewlett-Packard (HP)
competitors.notes: Most prominent PC and laptop competitor with wide range of products including printers and enterprise solutions; strong multi-decade presence

competitors.name: Lenovo
competitors.notes: Formidable competitor known for innovation and quality; diverse portfolio of laptops, desktops, tablets, smartphones; strengthened by IBM PC acquisition

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)
competitors.notes: Major competitor in enterprise infrastructure, intelligent edge-to-cloud solutions, servers, and storage

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Premium competitor in PCs, laptops, and consumer technology

competitors.name: NetApp
competitors.notes: Top competitor in enterprise data storage and infrastructure

competitors.name: Pure Storage
competitors.notes: Enterprise storage and data solutions competitor
